channel.title: Putting a small bank infront of lvl 1 edgeville
channel.description: pi source. how do i add a bank right infront of lvl 1 edgeville please and thanks :D

item.title: Putting a small bank infront of lvl 1 edgeville
item.dc:creator: @neil1111 neil1111
item.description:
@neil1111 wrote:

[quote=“sonsofgod2, post:3, topic:367932”]worldmap.java or worldobject.java cuz i went on both ctrl + f and searched c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(1596, 3040, 10307, -1, 0);
didnt find nothing. and its a project insanity … btw plz help tho.

	c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(1596, 3040, 10307, -1, 0)
            c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(Bank booth id, x coord, y Coord, Bank booth facing, 0);
	c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(1596, 3040, 10308, 1, 0);
	if (c.heightLevel == 0)

thats how it is. then i got about 10 errors.[/quote]
thats your problem the bank id need to be changed to the id you want, the x coord need changed the the x coord of where you want the bank to be, do ::mypos on the spot and change the x coord and y coords to the numbers that come up.

it should look like th other ones this is for my portal at home.

                c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(7315, 3084, 3500, 1, 0);

change the coords and object ids.

Read full topic
item.source: Putting a small bank infront of lvl 1 edgeville

item.title: Putting a small bank infront of lvl 1 edgeville
item.dc:creator: @sonsofgod2 sonsofgod2
item.description:
@sonsofgod2 wrote:

worldmap.java or worldobject.java cuz i went on both ctrl + f and searched c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(1596, 3040, 10307, -1, 0);
didnt find nothing. and its a project insanity … btw plz help tho.

c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(2561, 3099, 3498, 0, 10);
c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(2560, 3099, 3495, 0, 10);
c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(2564, 3099, 3492, 0, 10);
c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(2562, 3099, 3489, 0, 10);
c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(1755, 3055, 9774, 0, 0);
c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(1596, 3008, 3850, 1, 0);
c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(1596, 3008, 3849, -1, 0);
c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(1596, 3040, 10307, -1, 0)
c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(Bank booth id, x coord, y Coord, Bank booth facing, 0);
c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(1596, 3040, 10308, 1, 0);
c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(1596, 3022, 10311, -1, 0);
c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(1596, 3022, 10312, 1, 0);
c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(1596, 3044, 10341, -1, 0);
c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(1596, 3044, 10342, 1, 0);
c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(2213, 3047, 9779, 1, 10);
c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(2213, 3080, 9502, 1, 10);
c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(2475, 3233, 9312, 1, 10);
c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(4551, 2522, 3595, 1, 10);
c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(409, 3090, 3499, 1, 10);
c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(409, 2539, 4718, 1, 10);
if (c.heightLevel == 0)

thats how it is. then i got about 10 errors.

item.title: Putting a small bank infront of lvl 1 edgeville
item.dc:creator: @99matt99 99matt99
item.description:
@99matt99 wrote:

src server world object mangager look for something like this

		c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(1596, 3040, 10307, -1, 0);

add c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(Bank booth id, x coord, y Coord, Bank booth facing, 0);
